function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Scarcity of research and scientific uncertainties during pandemics","Impact":"Increased risk of making uninformed decisions that could worsen the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Invest in rapid research strategies and prioritize sharing of emerging evidence to inform decision-making","Technologies":"Data analytics and artificial intelligence for rapid analysis of emerging evidence","People":"Policy makers, public health officials, and decision-makers","Owner":"Research institutions and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Reliance on single case studies and observational studies as best available evidence","Impact":"Potential for decisions based on limited or biased evidence leading to ineffective containment measures","Mitigation":"Encourage multi-center studies and diverse data sources to improve the robustness of evidence","Technologies":"Data integration platforms and collaborative research networks","People":"Researchers, epidemiologists, and data analysts","Owner":"Public health agencies and international health organizations"},{"Description":"Reliance on indirect evidence from related viruses like influenza, SARS, and Ebola for policy response","Impact":"Risk of misinformed policies that are not specific to the actual pandemic, leading to ineffective strategies","Mitigation":"Combine indirect evidence with real-time data analysis to inform context-specific decision-making","Technologies":"Comparative data analysis tools and disease modeling software","People":"Epidemiologists, public health experts, and policy advisors","Owner":"Global health agencies and research institutions"}]}
